CRED_ID in (select EDP_CRED_ID from ETR_TB_ENDPOINT EDP, ETR_TB_ENDPOINT_WS EDP_WS where EDP.EDP_ID = EDP_WS.ID)

changeSet.author: brighab
changeSet.sql: create table ETR_TB_LOG_TEMP as select LOG_ID, LOG_TYPE, LOG_OPERATION, LOG_DESCRIPTION, LOG_VALUE, LOG_LARGE_VALUE, LOG_URL_CONTEXT, LOG_CORRELATION_ID, LOG_DOCUMENT_ID, LOG_DOCUMENT_TYPE_CD, LOG_BUS_CORRELATION_ID, LOG_TRA_ID, LOG_MSG_ID, LOG_MSG_BIN_ID, LOG_ISSUER_PTY_ID, LOG_SENDER_PTY_ID, LOG_RECEIVER_PTY_ID, LOG_BUSINESS_DOMAIN, CRE_DT, CRE_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, LOG_MSG_SIZE, LOG_AUTH_IP_ADDRESS, LOG_ENITITY_ID, LOG_ENTITY, (CASE LOG_MODULE WHEN 'e-TrustEx' THEN 'ETRUSTEX' WHEN 'eTrustEx' THEN 'ETRUSTEX' WHEN 'AS2ADAPTER' THEN 'AS2ADAPTER' WHEN 'CIPADMIN' THEN 'CIPADMIN' END) AS LOG_MODULE, LOG_USRNAME, LOG_USR_ROLE, LOG_CLASS from ETR_TB_LOG

column.name: MON_QUERY
column.value: select count(MSG_ID) from ETR_TB_MESSAGE where MSG_STS_CD in ('SUBMITTED') and CRE_DT > sysdate -14 and MSG_DOCUMENT_ID not like '%INVALID%'

column.name: MON_QUERY
column.value: select count(MR_ID) from ETR_TB_MESSAGE_ROUTING where MR_PROCESSED_FLAG = 0

column.name: MON_QUERY
column.value: select count(CRED_ID) from ETR_TB_CREDENTIALS where CRED_TYPE = 'PARTY' and CRED_PASSW_ENCRYPTED = 1 and CRED_PASSW not like '{SHA-1}%' and CRED_PASSW not like '$2a$12$%'

column.name: MON_QUERY
column.value: select count(ID) from ETR_TB_ENDPOINT_JMS where EDP_JMS_MESS_CON_CLASS is null

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ETR_TB_MONITORING_QUERY (MON_ID, MON_QUERY) VALUES (5, 'select count(CERT_ID) from ETR_TB_CERTIFICATE where CERT_VALID_TO < sysdate + 30')

column.name: MON_QUERY
column.value: select count(CRED_ID) from ETR_TB_CREDENTIALS where CRED_TYPE != 'PARTY' and IV is null

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ETR_TB_MONITORING_QUERY (MON_ID, MON_QUERY) VALUES (7, 'select PID_TRA_ID, count(MD_ID) from ETR_TB_METADATA where MD_TYPE = ''DOCUMENT_HUMAN_READABLE_PREPROC'' and PID_TRA_ID is not null group by PID_TRA_ID having count(MD_ID) > 1')

INSERT INTO ETR_TB_MONITORING_QUERY (MON_ID, MON_QUERY) VALUES (8, 'select PID_DOC_ID, count(MD_ID) from ETR_TB_METADATA where MD_TYPE = ''DOCUMENT_HUMAN_READABLE_PREPROC'' and PID_DOC_ID is not null group by PID_DOC_ID having count(MD_ID) > 1')

column.name: MON_QUERY
column.value: select count(MD_ID) - 1 from ETR_TB_METADATA where MD_TYPE = 'DOCUMENT_HUMAN_READABLE_XSLT_NAME_XPATH'

column.name: MON_QUERY
column.value: select count(HRT_ID) from ETR_TB_HR_TEMPLATE where HRT_DOC_ID is not null and HRT_TRA_ID is not null

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO ETR_TB_MONITORING_QUERY (MON_ID, MON_QUERY) VALUES (11, 'select HRT_DOC_ID, count(HRT_ID) from ETR_TB_HR_TEMPLATE where HRT_DOC_ID is not null and HRT_IS_DEFAULT = 1 group by HRT_DOC_ID having count(HRT_ID) > 1')

INSERT INTO ETR_TB_MONITORING_QUERY (MON_ID, MON_QUERY) VALUES (12, 'select HRT_TRA_ID, count(HRT_ID) from ETR_TB_HR_TEMPLATE where HRT_TRA_ID is not null and HRT_IS_DEFAULT = 1 group by HRT_TRA_ID having count(HRT_ID) > 1')

INSERT INTO ETR_TB_MONITORING_QUERY (MON_ID, MON_QUERY) VALUES (13, 'select PID_DOC_ID, MD_TYPE, count(MD_ID) from ETR_TB_METADATA where PID_DOC_ID is not null group by PID_DOC_ID, MD_TYPE having count(MD_ID) > 1')

INSERT INTO ETR_TB_MONITORING_QUERY (MON_ID, MON_QUERY) VALUES (14, 'select PID_TRA_ID, MD_TYPE, count(MD_ID) from ETR_TB_METADATA where PID_TRA_ID is not null group by PID_TRA_ID, MD_TYPE having count(MD_ID) > 1')

INSERT INTO ETR_TB_MONITORING_QUERY (MON_ID, MON_QUERY) VALUES (15, 'select PID_ICA_ID, MD_TYPE, count(MD_ID) from ETR_TB_METADATA where PID_ICA_ID is not null group by PID_ICA_ID, MD_TYPE having count(MD_ID) > 1')

INSERT INTO ETR_TB_MONITORING_QUERY (MON_ID, MON_QUERY) VALUES (16, 'select PID_PRO_ID, MD_TYPE, count(MD_ID) from ETR_TB_METADATA where PID_PRO_ID is not null and MD_TYPE <> ''DELETE_DOCUMENT_ALLOWED'' group by PID_PRO_ID, MD_TYPE having count(MD_ID) > 1')

INSERT INTO ETR_TB_MONITORING_QUERY (MON_ID, MON_QUERY) VALUES (17, 'select PID_PRO_ID, MD_SENDER_ID, count(MD_ID) from ETR_TB_METADATA where MD_TYPE = ''DELETE_DOCUMENT_ALLOWED'' group by PID_PRO_ID, MD_SENDER_ID having count(MD_ID) > 1')

INSERT INTO ETR_TB_MONITORING_QUERY (MON_ID, MON_QUERY) VALUES (18, 'select MD_SENDER_ID, MD_TYPE, count(MD_ID) from ETR_TB_METADATA where MD_SENDER_ID is not null group by MD_SENDER_ID, MD_TYPE having count(MD_ID) > 1')

INSERT INTO ETR_TB_MONITORING_QUERY (MON_ID, MON_QUERY) VALUES (19, 'select MD_BUSINESSDOMAIN_ID, MD_TYPE, count(MD_ID) from ETR_TB_METADATA where MD_BUSINESSDOMAIN_ID is not null group by MD_BUSINESSDOMAIN_ID, MD_TYPE having count(MD_ID) > 1')

column.name: MON_QUERY
column.value: SELECT count(*) FROM ETR_TB_ENDPOINT WHERE EDP_PROXY_CRED_ID is not null and (EDP_PROXY_HOST is null or EDP_PROXY_PORT is null)
